segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she doesn't notice the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is both amusing and worrying.
segments.speaker: PAR
